page.title: 12Brechin In The 1980's-2
page.content: I like Pop Music but Brechin does not have a large enough Population to have Pop Concerts.There is sometimes a Disco at the City Hall but it is not always very good .I wish that we could have better Discos. Brechin does have a Cinema but it is rather old and it does not have up to date equipment. All the new Films which come out are shown in the large cities first, which means we do not get to see them until a while after they're out.Brechin does have a B.M.X. Track which is a facility that is enjoyed by the boys especially those with a B.M.X. Bike.
